home.intro: Easily send fully encrypted, secure notes or files with one click. Just create a note and share the link.
home.explanation: the note will expire and be destroyed after {type}.
home.new_note_notice:
availability:
the note is not guaranteed to be stored as everything is kept in ram, if it fills up the oldest notes will be removed.
(you probably will be fine, just be warned.)

errors.note_to_big: could not create note. note is to big
errors.note_error: could not create note. please try again.

errors.not_found: note was not found or was already deleted.
errors.decryption_failed: wrong password. could not decipher. probably a broken link. note was destroyed.

show.explanation: click below to show and delete the note if the counter has reached it's limit
show.warning_will_not_see_again: you will not get the chance to see the note again.
